Package org.openfaces.component.panel

Class Summary
AbstractPanelWithCaption  
BorderLayoutPanel  
FoldingPanel The FoldingPanel component is a container for other components that can be expanded and collapsed by the user.
LayeredPane  
MultiPageContainer  
SidePanel  
SubPanel  
SubPanels  
TabbedPane The TabbedPane component is a container that consists of several sub-containers called pages and allows the user to switch between these pages using a set of tabs.
